definition: difference/discrepancy/to differ/error/to err/to make a mistake
to differ from/to fall short of/lacking/wrong/inferior/Taiwan pr. [cha1]

sentences.english: An analysis on the differential benefit of heavy-load traffic expressway was made.
sentences.chinese: 分析了重載交通高速公路的級差效益。

sentences.english: The emission intensity is given by the absorptance of the volume in which there is a difference of the quasi Fermi energies.
sentences.chinese: 輻射強度由存在準費米能級差的體積的吸收率決定。

sentences.english: Such gradable meaning coincides with the cognitive mechanism of human beings.
sentences.chinese: 這些級差意義的產生與人類的認知機制是吻合的。

sentences.english: And the answer lies clearly in the energy difference.
sentences.chinese: 從能級差看，答案很明顯。
